generalInfo: Ecuador has an embarrassment of riches when it comes to natural wonders and indigenous cultures and this itinerary will showcase the very best of each. Explore the three main habitats on mainland Ecuador: the cloud forest, high Andes and of course the Amazon jungle, where you will also spend time with Amazonian communities that have chosen tourism over the money they could make selling their land to oil companies. This is the very best of one of Latin America's true gems.

dayInfo.description: Upon arrival into Quito airport, you will be met by one of our representatives and taken to your hotel in Quito old town to check-in and relax.
Today is free for you to explore this UNESCO World Heritage City. If you prefer we can arrange a guide to help you explore. (B)
After a delicious breakfast lunch you will take the relatively short drive north to a beautiful cloud forest, where you will spend the next few days surrounded by trees and bird life. (B/L/D)

Wake to the sounds of the forest nice and early and go on a guided hike to spot some of the incredible array of bird life that calls this reserve home. Spend the rest of the day exploring with a guide or on your own. (B/L/D)
You will have another chance to explore the forest today before transferring back to Quito for the afternoon. (B/L/D)
Fly into the Amazon and transfer by boat to your Jungle Lodge. We work closely with a few lodges to cover most budgets however they all offer the most incredible Amazon experience! (B/D)
You will explore the Amazon jungle on foot and by canoe and take part in some of the activities run by the lodge and local communities, such as piranha fishing and night walks. (B/L/D)
One last morning under the big green canopy before making your way by boat and plane back to Quito. (B/L)

Your journey now turns south as you drive to the wide open spaces of Cotopaxi National Park, filled with tropical flowers, beautiful mountain lakes and, of course, the stunning Cotopaxi volcano. Once you reach your lodge you can relax and stroll among the beautiful scenery, or we can arrange hikes or horseriding for you. (B)
Spend the morning horse riding alongside the local cowboys and pass the afternoon however you like. (B)
Leave Cotopaxi as you travel across the valley to the insanely beautiful crater lake of Quilotoa. Hike around the rim before heading back to Quito for your last night. (B/L/D)
We'll take you to the airport in time for your international flight, taking home lots of wonderful memories of Ecuador. (B)
